CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 11, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "On Way to Court - Raymond Lawson is shown in the custody of a deputy sheriff before appearing in court to testify about the fatal shooting of 'Big Three' auto salesman Jack Allison during an argument over alleged 'hiked' auto payments. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Deputy sheriff wearing badge and cuffed to murder suspect Raymond Lawson in hallway of Allegheny County Courthouse, Downtown
